description: A library of presentational UI web components built with Lit Element and TypeScript for consumption by web applications.

components.name: cre8-button
components.description: Primary interactive element for user actions. Supports primary, secondary, and tertiary variants with extensive customization options.

components.name: cre8-danger-button
components.description: Button for destructive actions like delete or remove.

components.name: cre8-split-button
components.description: Split button with primary action and dropdown menu.

components.name: cre8-field
components.description: Text input field with label and validation support. Extends Cre8FormElement for form association.

components.name: cre8-field-note
components.description: Helper, error, or success text for form fields.

components.name: cre8-select
components.description: Native select dropdown with label and validation support. Extends Cre8FormElement.

components.name: cre8-multi-select
components.description: Multi-select dropdown for choosing multiple options.

components.name: cre8-checkbox-field-item
components.description: Individual checkbox item within a CheckboxField.

components.name: cre8-radio-field
components.description: Group container for radio button items.

components.name: cre8-radio-field-item
components.description: Individual radio button within a RadioField.

components.name: cre8-date-picker
components.description: Date picker input component. Extends Cre8FormElement.

components.name: cre8-card
components.description: Container card for grouping related content.

components.name: cre8-layout
components.description: Page layout wrapper with header, main, and footer areas.

components.name: cre8-linelength-container
components.description: Container that constrains line length for optimal readability.

components.name: cre8-heading
components.description: Heading text component with semantic levels and typography presets.

components.name: cre8-text-passage
components.description: Typography wrapper for body text and paragraphs.

components.name: cre8-tabs
components.description: Tab navigation container with automatic management.

components.name: cre8-modal
components.description: Modal dialog overlay with focus trap.

components.name: cre8-table-object
components.description: Object-based table abstraction for rendering tables from data.

remove.description: Fired when remove button is clicked

components.name: cre8-chart
components.description: Chart visualization component. Integrates with Chart.js.

data-click.description: Fired when data point is clicked

components.name: cre8-icon
components.description: SVG icon renderer with 100+ built-in icons.

components.name: cre8-feature
components.description: Feature highlight component for marketing pages.

components.name: cre8-page-header
components.description: Page header with title and actions.

baseClasses.name: Cre8Element
baseClasses.description: Base class extending LitElement with utility methods.

componentClassNames.description: Helper for applying class names with variants

slotEmpty.description: Check if a named slot has content

baseClasses.name: Cre8FormElement
baseClasses.description: Base class for form-associated custom elements. Extends Cre8Element.

patterns.name: Login Form
patterns.description: Standard login form with email and password
patterns.template:
<cre8-card>
  <cre8-heading tag-variant="h2" type="headline-default">Sign In</cre8-heading>
  <cre8-field label="Email" type="email"></cre8-field>
  <cre8-field label="Password" type="password"></cre8-field>
  <cre8-button text="Sign In" variant="primary" full-width></cre8-button>
</cre8-card>

patterns.name: Data Table
patterns.description: Table with header and data rows

patterns.name: Page Layout
patterns.description: Standard page with header, main content, and footer
patterns.template: Home 2024 Company Name

patterns.name: Alert Banner
patterns.description: Dismissible alert at top of page
patterns.template:
<cre8-alert status="info" variant="banner">
  Important announcement message here.
</cre8-alert>

patterns.name: Tabbed Content
patterns.template:
<cre8-tabs>
  <cre8-tab label="Tab 1" tab-id="tab1" selected></cre8-tab>
  <cre8-tab label="Tab 2" tab-id="tab2"></cre8-tab>
  <cre8-tab-panel tab-id="tab1" slot="panel">Content for Tab 1</cre8-tab-panel>
  <cre8-tab-panel tab-id="tab2" slot="panel">Content for Tab 2</cre8-tab-panel>
</cre8-tabs>

patterns.name: Modal Dialog
patterns.description: Modal with header, body, and footer actions
patterns.template:
Confirm Action

Are you sure you want to proceed?

designTokens.description: Design tokens are provided by the @tmorrow/cre8-design-tokens package

features: Keyboard navigation (Escape, Tab, Arrow keys, Enter, Space)
